View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.oracle;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   
5   public abstract class ConcreteOracleSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
6   
7       public ConcreteOracleSuiteIT() {
8           this.config();
9       }
10      
11      public void config() {
12          /*
13              Oracle Database 19c (19.3.0) Enterprise Edition and Standard Edition 2
14  
15              - Download LINUX.X64_193000_db_home.zip in folder 19.3.0
16              - buildDockerImage.sh -v 19.3.0 -e
17              
18              docker run --name oracle19ee \
19              -p 1521:1521 -p 5500:5500 \
20              -e ORACLE_SID=ORCLCDB \
21              -e ORACLE_PDB=ORCLPDB1 \
22              -e ORACLE_PWD=Password1_One \
23              -e ORACLE_CHARACTERSET=AL32UTF8 \
24              oracle/database:19.3.0-ee
25  
26              - Virtualbox port forward 11521 => 1521
27  
28              jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:11521:ORCLCDB
29              system
30              Password1_One
31           */
32          
33          this.jdbcURL = "jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:11521:ORCLCDB";
34          this.jdbcUser = "system";
35          this.jdbcPass = "Password1_One";
36          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "SYSTEM";
37          this.jsqlTableName = "STUDENT";
38          this.jsqlColumnName = "STUDENT_ID";
39          
40          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "owner";
41          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "table_name";
42          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "column_name";
43          
44          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "SELECT owner FROM all_tables";
45          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames = "SELECT table_name FROM all_tables where owner='SYSTEM'";
46          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames = "SELECT column_name FROM all_tab_columns where owner='SYSTEM' and table_name='STUDENT'";
47          this.jdbcQueryForValues = "SELECT STUDENT_ID FROM SYSTEM.STUDENT";
48      }
49  }
